column2: You take the bubbling potion down to your dungeons, and force [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetFirstName] to try it. [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetSheHeCap] splutters and coughs, but seems to be ok. However, after careful observation [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetSheHe] also shows no signs of increased libido - the love potion hasn't worked!
column3: Vous prenez la potion bouillonnante dans vos donjons et forcez [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetFirstName] pour l'essayer. [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetSheHeCap] éclate et tousse, mais semble être correct. Cependant, après une observation attentive [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetSheHe] ne montre pas non plus de signes de libido accrue - la potion n'a pas fonctionné!
column4: Du nimmst den sprudelnden Trank in deine Kerker und zwickst [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetFirstName], um es zu versuchen. [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetSheHeCap] splutters und hustet, scheint aber ok zu sein. Doch nach sorgfältiger Beobachtung [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetSheHe] zeigt auch keine Anzeichen einer erhöhten Libido - der Trank hat nicht gearbeitet!
column6: Toma la poción burbujeante hasta tus mazmorras, y fuerza [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetFirstName] para intentarlo. [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetSheHeCap] splutters y toses, pero parece estar bien. Sin embargo, después de una observación cuidadosa (robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetSheHe) también no muestra signos de aumento de la libido - la poción no ha funcionado!

column2: You take the bubbling potion down to your dungeons, and force [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetFirstName] to try it. [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetSheHeCap] seems ok for a second or two, but then begins vomitting violently, and runs to the bucket in the corner! It seems the potion still requires some work...
column3: Vous prenez la potion bouillonnante dans vos donjons et forcez [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetFirstName] pour l'essayer. [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetSheHeCap] semble correct pour une seconde ou deux, mais commence à vomir violemment et court vers le seau dans le coin! Il semble que la potion demande encore du travail ...
column4: Du nimmst den sprudelnden Trank in deine Kerker und zwickst [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetFirstName], um es zu versuchen. [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetSheHeCap] scheint für ein oder zwei Sekunden ok, aber dann beginnt er heftig zu erbrechen und läuft zum Eimer in der Ecke! Es scheint, dass der Trank noch etwas Arbeit braucht ...
column6: Toma la poción burbujeante hasta tus mazmorras, y fuerza [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetFirstName] para intentarlo. [robmod_prisoner_guineapig.GetSheHeCap] parece estar bien por un segundo o dos, pero luego empieza a vomitar violentamente, y corre al cubo en la esquina! Parece que la poción todavía requiere algo de trabajo ...

column2: You call for [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetFirstName] and force [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetHerHim] to try the bubbling potion. [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetSheHeCap] splutters and coughs, but seems to be ok. However, on questioning the next day, [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetSheHe] also reports no signs of increased libido - the love potion hasn't worked!
column3: Vous appelez [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetFirstName] et forcer [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetHerHim] à essayer la potion bouillonnante. [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetSheHeCap] éclate et tousse, mais semble être correct. Toutefois, lors d'un interrogatoire le lendemain, [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetSheHe] ne signale pas non plus de signes de libido accrue - la potion n'a pas fonctionné!
column4: Sie rufen nach [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetFirstName] und zwingen [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetHerHim], den sprudelnden Trank auszuprobieren. [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetSheHeCap] splutters und hustet, scheint aber ok zu sein. Doch bei der Befragung am nächsten Tag berichtet [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetSheHe] auch keine Anzeichen einer erhöhten Libido - der Trank hat nicht gearbeitet!
column6: Usted llama para [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetFirstName] y fuerza [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetHerHim] para probar la poción burbujeante. [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetSheHeCap] splutters y toses, pero parece estar bien. Sin embargo, al preguntar al día siguiente, [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetSheHe] también no informa de signos de aumento de la libido - la poción no ha funcionado!

column2: You call for [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetFirstName] and force [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetHerHim] to try the bubbling potion. [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetSheHeCap] seems ok for a second or two, but then begins vomitting violently on the floor, and runs to the privy! It seems the potion still requires some work...
column3: Vous appelez [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetFirstName] et forcer [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetHerHim] à essayer la potion bouillonnante. [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetSheHeCap] semble correct pour une seconde ou deux, mais commence à vomir violemment sur le sol et court au privé! Il semble que la potion demande encore du travail ...
column4: Sie rufen nach [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetFirstName] und zwingen [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetHerHim], den sprudelnden Trank auszuprobieren. [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetSheHeCap] scheint für ein oder zwei Sekunden ok, aber dann beginnt er heftig auf dem Boden zu erbrechen und läuft ins Geheimnis! Es scheint, dass der Trank noch etwas Arbeit braucht ...
column6: Usted llama para [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetFirstName] y fuerza [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetHerHim] para probar la poción burbujeante. [robmod_courtier_guineapig.GetSheHeCap] parece estar bien por un segundo o dos, pero luego empieza a vomitar violentamente en el piso, y corre a la privada! Parece que la poción todavía requiere algo de trabajo ...

column2: You put the bubbling flask to your lips, and take a deep gulp of the potion. The foul taste makes your retch, but you feel ok. However, over the next few hours you feel no increase in your libido and the physical effects are... disappointing. The love potion hasn't worked!
column3: Vous mettez le flacon bouillonnant sur vos lèvres, et prenez un glas profond de la potion. Le goût délicat rend votre vrille, mais vous vous sentez bien. Cependant, au cours des prochaines heures, vous ne ressentez aucune augmentation de votre libido et les effets physiques sont ... décevants. La potion d'amour n'a pas fonctionné!
column4: Du legst die sprudelnde Flasche auf deine Lippen und nimm einen tiefen Schluck des Trankes. Der faule Geschmack macht deinen Rückschlag, aber du fühlst dich ok. Doch in den nächsten Stunden fühlst du keinen Anstieg in deiner Libido und die physischen Effekte sind ... enttäuschend. Der Liebestrank hat nicht gearbeitet!
column6: Pones el frasco de burbujas en tus labios y toma un trago profundo de la poción. El mal sabor hace que tu vómito, pero te sientes bien. Sin embargo, en las próximas horas no sientes ningún aumento en tu libido y los efectos físicos son ... decepcionantes. ¡La poción de amor no ha funcionado!

column2: You put the bubbling flask to your lips, and take a deep gulp of the potion. For a moment or two you feel ok, but then a fire lights in your throat and you begin vomitting violently, before running to the privy and spending the rest of the evening there with your undergarments around your ankles. It seems the potion still requires some work...
column3: Vous mettez le flacon bouillonnant sur vos lèvres, et prenez un glas profond de la potion. Pendant un moment ou deux, vous vous sentez bien, mais un feu s'allume dans votre gorge et vous commencez à vomir violemment, avant de vous rendre au privé et de passer le reste de la soirée avec vos sous-vêtements autour de vos chevilles. Il semble que la potion demande encore du travail ...
column4: Du legst die sprudelnde Flasche auf deine Lippen und nimm einen tiefen Schluck des Trankes. Für einen Moment oder zwei fühlst du dich gut, aber dann brennt ein Feuer in deiner Kehle, und du fängst heftig zu erbrechen, bevor du zum Geheimnis gehst und den Rest des Abends dort mit deinen Unterwäsche um deine Knöchel verbringst. Es scheint, dass der Trank noch etwas Arbeit braucht ...
column6: Pones el frasco de burbujas en tus labios y toma un trago profundo de la poción. Por un momento o dos te sientes bien, pero luego un fuego se enciende en tu garganta y comienzas a vomitar violentamente, antes de correr al privado y pasar el resto de la noche allí con tu ropa interior alrededor de tus tobillos. Parece que la poción todavía requiere algo de trabajo ...

column2: Back to the drawing board.
column3: Je vais devoir recommencer.
column4: Ich muss wieder anfangen.
column6: Voy a tener que empezar de nuevo.

column2: What a mess!
column3: Quel bordel!
column4: Was für ein Chaos!
column6: ¡Que desastre!

column2: Continue your experimentation
column3: Continuez votre expérimentation
column4: Fortsetzen Sie Ihr Experimentieren
column6: Continúa tu experimentación

column2: After returning to the original texts and making numerous tweaks, you think you've finally hit on a viable aphrodisiacal brew. Your test rats are all healthy, and they are exhibiting an increase to their (frankly already voracious) appétit d'amour.
column3: Après avoir retourné aux textes originaux et fait de nombreux ajustements, vous pensez que vous avez finalement frappé un brassage aphrodisiaque viable. Vos rats d'essai sont tous en bonne santé, et ils affichent une augmentation de leur appétit (franchement déjà vorace) pour l'amour.
column4: Nach der Rückkehr zu den Originaltexten und machen viele Tweaks, denkst du, du hast endlich auf ein lebensfähiges Aphrodisiakal gebraten. Ihre Test-Ratten sind alle gesund, und sie zeigen eine Zunahme zu ihrem (ehrlich schon unersättlichen) Appetit auf Liebe.
column6: Después de regresar a los textos originales y hacer numerosos ajustes, usted piensa que finalmente ha llegado a una cerveza aphrodisiacal viable. Sus ratas de prueba son todas sanas, y están exhibiendo un aumento de su (francamente ya voraz) apetito por el amor.

column2: Now for the final test...
column3: Maintenant pour le test final ...
column4: Jetzt für den letzten Test ...
column6: Ahora para la prueba final ...

column2: Try out the love potion
column3: Essayez la potion d'amour
column4: Probiere den Liebestrank aus
column6: Prueba la poción de amor

column2: The potion still tastes foul, but the effects are far more... pleasing. Within an hour, you begin to feel like you could seduce a eunuch, and later that evening you feel an irresistible urge to satiate your desires...
column3: La potion connaît toujours une faute, mais les effets sont beaucoup plus ... plaisants. Dans une heure, vous commencez à sentir comme si vous pouviez séduire un eunuque, et plus tard dans la soirée, vous ressentez une incitation irrésistible à rassasier vos désirs ...
column4: Der Trank schmeckt noch Foul, aber die Effekte sind viel mehr ... angenehm. Innerhalb einer Stunde fängst du an zu fühlen, wie du einen Eunuch verführen kannst, und später am Abend fühlst du einen unwiderstehlichen Drang, deine Wünsche zu sättigen ...
column6: La poción todavía sabe mal, pero los efectos son mucho más ... agradables. Dentro de una hora, empiezas a sentir que puedes seducir a un eunuco, y más tarde esa noche sientes un impulso irresistible para saciar tus deseos ...

column2: It works! I must send a sample to [robmod_norse_vinir.GetSocietyRank] [robmod_norse_vinir.GetFirstName].
column3: Ça marche! Je dois envoyer un échantillon à [robmod_norse_vinir.GetSocietyRank] [robmod_norse_vinir.GetFirstName].
column4: Es klappt! Ich muss ein Beispiel an [robmod_norse_vinir.GetSocietyRank] [robmod_norse_vinir.GetFirstName] senden.
column6: ¡Funciona! Debo enviar una muestra a [robmod_norse_vinir.GetSocietyRank] [robmod_norse_vinir.GetFirstName].

column2: Wait for [robmod_norse_vinir.GetHerHis] response
column3: Attendez la réponse de Vinir
column4: Warte auf die Antwort des Vinir
column6: Espera la respuesta del Vinir

column2:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

I received your sample potion with interest, and upon having my assistant try it out I was most impressed by the effects! I believe you have now learnt the necessary arts, and congratulate you on your success.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column3:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName] 

J'ai reçu votre échantillon de potion avec intérêt, et après avoir essayé mon assistant, j'ai été très impressionné par les effets! Je crois que vous avez maintenant appris les arts nécessaires et vous félicite pour votre succès.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signé, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column4:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Ich erhielt Ihre Probe Trank mit Interesse, und nachdem ich meine Assistentin ausprobieren, war ich am meisten beeindruckt von den Effekten! Ich glaube, Sie haben jetzt die notwendigen Künste gelernt und gratulieren Ihnen zu Ihrem Erfolg.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Gezeichnet

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column6:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]:

Recibí tu poción de muestra con interés, y después de que mi asistente probarlo, me impresionó más los efectos! Creo que ahora has aprendido las artes necesarias y te felicito por tu éxito.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Firmado: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

column2: Perfect!
column3: Parfait!
column4: Perfekt!
column6: ¡Perfecto!

column2:
Gods' blessings upon thee, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

The Trúhölla are always in need of more Sisters to tend the realm and seek the higher truths. I ask of you to nominate a maiden as a Friggssnipt, that Oðinn's wisdom may be spread.

May the Vanir favour thee,
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column3:
Les bénédictions de dieux sur toi, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

Les Trúhölla ont toujours besoin de plus de sœurs pour tisser le royaume et chercher les vérités supérieures. Je vous demande de nommer une jeune fille comme un Friggssnipt, que la sagesse d'Oðinn peut se propager.

Vous pouvez vous préférer à Vanir,
Signé, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column4:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Die Trúhölla brauchen immer mehr Schwestern, um das Reich zu tendieren und die höheren Wahrheiten zu suchen. Ich bitte von Ihnen, ein Mädchen als Friggssnipt zu nominieren, dass Oðinns Weisheit verbreitet werden kann.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Gezeichnet

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column6:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]:

Los Trúhölla siempre necesitan más Hermanas para cuidar el reino y buscar las verdades más altas. Les pido que nombren a una doncella como un Friggssnipt, que la sabiduría de Oðinn pueda extenderse.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Firmado: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

column2:
Gods' blessings upon thee, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

I have received word from my Sister at the Trúhöll that your nominee has arrived safely. On behalf of the Order, the Trúhölla, and all the followers of the Beyð faith, I thank you.

May the Vanir favour thee,
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column3:
Les bénédictions de dieux sur toi, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

J'ai reçu un mot de ma soeur chez le Trúhöll pour dire que votre candidat est arrivé en toute sécurité. Au nom de l'Ordre, les Trúhölla et tous les partisans de la foi Beyð, je vous remercie.

Vous pouvez vous préférer à Vanir,
Signé, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column4:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Ich habe von meiner Schwester bei der Trúhöll ein Wort erhalten, dass Ihr Kandidat sicher angekommen ist. Im Namen des Ordens, der Trúhölla und aller Anhänger des Beyð-Glaubens, danke ich Ihnen.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Gezeichnet

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column6:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]:

He recibido noticias de mi hermana en el Trúhöll que su candidato ha llegado con seguridad. En nombre de la Orden, los Trúhölla, y todos los seguidores de la fe Beyð, les doy las gracias.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Firmado: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

column2: Anything for the true Gods!
column3: Quelque chose pour les vrais dieux!
column4: Alles für die wahren Götter!
column6: Cualquier cosa para los Dioses verdaderos!

column2:
Gods' blessings upon thee, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

The Norse realm is always under threat from the followers of lesser Gods. I ask of you to send an able warrior to the Trúhölla to take the Trials of Thor, that he may defend our faith.

May the Vanir favour thee,
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column3:
Les bénédictions de dieux sur toi, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

Le royaume des Normés est toujours menacé par les adeptes des dieux inférieurs. Je vous prie d'envoyer un guerrier capable au Trúhölla pour prendre les Procès de Thor, afin qu'il puisse défendre notre foi.

Vous pouvez vous préférer à Vanir,
Signé, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column4:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Das nordische Reich ist immer von den Anhängern kleinerer Götter bedroht. Ich bitte Sie, einen Gefährten an die Trúhölla zu schicken, um die Prüfungen von Thor zu nehmen, damit er unseren Glauben verteidigen kann.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Gezeichnet

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column6:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]:

El reino nórdico está siempre bajo la amenaza de los seguidores de los dioses menores. Les pido que envíen a un guerrero capaz a la Trúhölla para que tome las Pruebas de Thor, para que pueda defender nuestra fe.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Firmado: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

column2:

column2: May he be successful in the Þorfreista!

column4: Möge er in der Þorfreista erfolgreich sein!
column6: ¡Que tenga éxito en la Þorfreista!

column2: The Sorceress [From.GetBestName] has finally arrived at my court. [From.GetFirstName] is skilled in the art of seiðr and communing with the Gods, and I will happily receive her counsel and wisdom.
column3: L[From.GetAscetic] [From.GetBestName] est enfin arrivé à ma cour. [From.GetFirstName] est un[From.GetNoneE] [From.GetManWoman] très noble et sage, et je serai heureu[Root.GetXSe] de recevoir ses conseils en matière de religion et de recherches savantes.
column4: Der/die [From.GetAscetic] [From.GetBestName] ist endlich an meinem Hof eingetroffen. [From.GetFirstName] ist ein sehr nobler weiser Mensch, und ich werde mir gerne seinen/ihren Rat zu Belangen der Religion und der Gelehrsamkeit einholen.
column6: El/La [From.GetAscetic] [From.GetBestName] por fin ha llegado a mi corte. [From.GetFirstName] es una persona noble y de gran sabiduría. Con gusto recibiré sus consejos en materia de religión y asuntos académicos.

column2: With the help of my assistant, I prepare the healing ritual. Incantations are spoken, and a pregnant sow is sacrificed, its blood added hissing to a growing fire. Within a few minutes I begin to feel upon me the blessing of Eir, the Goddess of mercy and healing.

column2: [From.GetBestName] submitted to my wisdom and allowed me to perform the healing ritual. The ceremony involves fire, a pregnant sow, and no small amount of wailing (mostly from the sacrificed hog). The blessing of Eir, the Goddess of mercy and healing, is conferred upon [From.GetFirstName], and [From.GetSheHe] should recover from [From.GetHerHis] illness in time.

column2: I have agreed to let [From.GetBestName] attempt to heal me of my illness in a magic ritual. Incantations are spoken, and a pregnant sow is sacrificed, its blood added hissing to the fire. As the flames grow higher I begin to see faces within it, which coalesce into a dark shape that attempts to enter my body. Is this Eir, the Goddess of mercy, bringer of healing? Or could it be the spirit of Loki impersonating her in an attempt to possess me?!

column2: [From.GetFullName] has gained the trait 'Possessed'.

[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

The hectic life of a ruler rarely allows for sufficient time to offer yourself to the Gods. I ask of you to seclude yourself and beseech the Æsir and the Vanir for their blessing. You will need the favour of the Gods in Valhalla, [Root.GetSocietyRank].

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column3:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName] 

La vie trépidante de quelqu'un qui règne donne rarement suffisamment de temps pour la contemplation. Je vous demande de vous isoler et de penser à l'univers et à votre place en lui. La conscience est la première étape vers la liberté, [Root.GetSocietyRank]. 

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signé, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column4:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

das hektische Leben eines Herrschers lässt nicht viel Zeit für Meditation. Ich bitte Euch, Euch zurückzuziehen und über das Universum und Euren Platz darin nachzudenken. Erkenntnis ist der erste Schritt zur Freiheit.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Gezeichnet

[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
column6:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]:

La vida de un gobernante es frenética y no suele dejar tiempo para la contemplación. Te pido que te recluyas y reflexiones acerca del universo y de tu lugar dentro de él. La conciencia es el primer paso hacia la libertad, [Root.GetSocietyRank].

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Firmado: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]

column2: In a shady corner of a local tavern, you meet with the Seiðmaðr [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetTitledName] - it seems one can be persecuted as a man for practicing seiðr, so he wants to avoid drawing attention to himself. Indeed, he looks just like any other man, and you wonder what his qualifications are. As if detecting your cynicism, [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetFirstName] speaks in a low voice and runs his hand over a nearby candle and to your astonishment the flame turns green! After some questioning, he agrees to tutor you in the ways of magic, but claims that in order to begin your training you must first receive a Hrafn-Hylli ('raven blessing') - in practice this means finding and taming a wild raven.

column2: The Seiðkona [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetTitledName] arrives at your halls. She looks just like any other woman, and you can't help wondering what her qualifications are. As if detecting your cynicism, [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetFirstName] shrieks a command and to your astonishment all the torches in your hall turn green! After some questioning, she agrees to tutor you in the ways of magic, but claims that in order to begin your training you must first receive a Hrafn-Hylli ('raven blessing') - in practice this means finding and taming a wild raven.

column2: Begin the search for a wild raven

You are sitting out alone on your lands and wondering how one tames a raven, when one lands but five feet away from you. The raven looks at you inquisitively, and upon inspection you see it is thin and its feathers are sparse. Its eyes seem to beckon you towards it...

column2: The search for the Hrafn-Hylli continues

You reach into your satchel and pull out a crust of bread, leaving it on the rock a few feet away. The raven looks at the bread hungrily, then back at you. After doing this several times, it hops onto the rock and begins pecking at the crust, its eyes never leaving you.

column2: You resolve to return the next day with more food

For the last few weeks you have been travelling to the same rock where you met the raven, and each day it is there waiting for you. Over time it relaxes in your presence, until finally one day it hops onto your hand. The next day, it follows you back to your halls.

column2: I am truly blessed by Oðinn.
column3: [Root.GetMOGreeting], [From.GetBestName] !

column6: ¡[Root.GetMOGreeting], [From.GetBestName]!

column2: You inform [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetTitledName] of your success

Upon observing the raven's behaviour towards you, [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetTitledName] confirms that you are indeed Hrafn-Hylli. However, [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetSheHe] points out that seiðr is a feminine art and that as a man, practicing it publicly would bring the taboo of Ergi upon you. Therefore, it is important you find a Seiðr-Þræll ('Seiðr-Thrall', a female assistant) to perform the more feminal parts of the ceremonies.
Yes, I was wondering what I was meant to do with the píka-stang...
column3: [Root.GetMOGreeting], [From.GetBestName] !
column4: [Root.GetMOGreeting], [From.GetBestName]!
column6: ¡[Root.GetMOGreeting], [From.GetBestName]!

column2: Begin the search for an assistant

You are at a ceremony at a nearby Yggdrasil pole when you see a young woman go into a fit, shrieking and flailing her arms. Seeing your alarm, a Goði informs you that she is merely in 'sjoða' - a loss of physical control associated with seiðr. Looking at her, you see she is bare-footed and malnutritioned - perhaps she lives in the forest. If she is indeed practiced in sorcery and in need of a master, maybe she would agree to be your assistant?

column2: Back at the Yggdrasil pole for another ceremony, you see the young woman who ate your gold again. She looks even worse than before - on the edge of death indeed - but still she performs her sjoða. Perhaps she would be more responsive to a less worldly type of persuasion?

column2: Make a display of your budding powers in order to persuade her to join you

column2: Offer her gold to persuade her to join you

After the ceremony you approach the woman and offer her money, but are met only with silence. When you hand over a purse of gold, she takes each coin out and swallows it! She walks away, leaving bloody footprints behind.

column6: ¡[Root.GetMOGreeting], [From.GetBestName]!

column2: The search for an assistant continues

After the ceremony you approach the woman and speak to her of your training, but are met only with silence. But as soon as you perform a quick rite with your blessing stick, she bows before you, kissing your feet and offering her hands up in supplicance. Later, you return to [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetFirstName] and [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetSheHe] agrees that the woman will do well as a Seiðr-Þræll.

column2: Upon observing the raven's behaviour towards you, [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetTitledName] confirms that you are indeed Hrafn-Hylli, and invites you to assist [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetHerHim] in an Enochian blessing ritual [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetSheHe] is performing that evening. You help [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetFirstName] with the preparations, reading from the grimoires and learning much about the proper processes. During the ceremony itself, you feel the blessing of the Gods.
I am on my way to becoming a Seiðrmaðr!

column2: You continue to learn from [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetTitledName], assisting at [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetHerHis] rituals

You have been continuing your tutelage in seiðr with [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetFirstName], but something nags at you. In all your training, you are yet to see anything that does not have a material explanation rather than a magical one. Should you speak to your tutor of your doubts?

column2: You speak with [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetFirstName] about your concerns. You are surprised when [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetSheHe] openly admits that much you do is for 'theatrical' purposes. [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetSheHeCap] even divulges that an alchemic powder is responsible for [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetHerHis] flame-colour trick. But [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetFirstName] goes on to explain that the blessings are indeed real, the illusions simply serve to sway the cynical. Seeing your shock, [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetSheHe] asks whether you wish to continue your learning.

column2: End your training

You have spent many months training with [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetFirstName], and today [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetSheHe] says you are ready for the final blessing of powers. "However, nothing is without cost" [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetSheHe] says, before explaining that the Gods' favour must be bought with something - rather someone - you love. You are too shocked to respond immediately, but in your chambers later you mull over the decision.

column2: Prepare the ritual. You will be discreet and no-one will ever know, but the fact remains that [robmodnorse_courtier.GetFullName] will die!

You and [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetFirstName] abduct [robmodnorse_spouse.GetFirstName] and discreetly take [robmodnorse_spouse.GetHerHim] to a clearing. Thankfully, the sleeping potion you gave [robmodnorse_spouse.GetHerHim] worked, and you don't have to look into [robmodnorse_spouse.GetHerHis] eyes as you slit [robmodnorse_spouse.GetHerHis] throat. After the ritual is performed and [robmodnorse_spouse.GetFirstName]'s body is burned in offer to the Gods, you are told by [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetFirstName] that [robmodnorse_sorcerer.GetSheHe] can sense the power bestowed upon you already. You only hope it is worth the sacrifice...

column2: The servant girl dealt with, you make a quick exit from [robmodnorse_accursed.GetFirstName]'s halls. On the return home, you look over what you have managed to purloin. Yes, this should do nicely to enact the curse.
column3: L[From.GetAscetic] [From.GetBestName] est enfin arrivé à ma cour. [From.GetFirstName] est un[From.GetNoneE] [From.GetManWoman] très noble et sage, et je serai heureu[Root.GetXSe] de recevoir ses conseils en matière de religion et de recherches savantes.
column4: Der/die [From.GetAscetic] [From.GetBestName] ist endlich an meinem Hof eingetroffen. [From.GetFirstName] ist ein sehr nobler weiser Mensch, und ich werde mir gerne seinen/ihren Rat zu Belangen der Religion und der Gelehrsamkeit einholen.
column6: El/La [From.GetAscetic] [From.GetBestName] por fin ha llegado a mi corte. [From.GetFirstName] es una persona noble y de gran sabiduría. Con gusto recibiré sus consejos en materia de religión y asuntos académicos.

column2: Time for the final preparations...
column3: [Root.GetMOGreeting], [From.GetBestName] !
column4: [Root.GetMOGreeting], [From.GetBestName]!
column6: ¡[Root.GetMOGreeting], [From.GetBestName]!

column2: The ritual should be ready soon

It is a dark night with no moon as you light the fire for the ritual that will - Freyr willing - lay the curse on [robmodnorse_accursed.GetFirstName]. As your assistant begins wailing the incantations, you slice off the hen's head and let its blood land on the item you stole. Then you cut your hand with a ceremonial dagger, a few drops of your own blood join the hen's. "My Lord Freyr, most virile and prosperous of all the Gods! I call on you to curse [robmodnorse_accursed.GetBestName] with sterility. Never shall [robmodnorse_accursed.GetSheHe] spawn progeny again!"
column3: L[From.GetAscetic] [From.GetBestName] est enfin arrivé à ma cour. [From.GetFirstName] est un[From.GetNoneE] [From.GetManWoman] très noble et sage, et je serai heureu[Root.GetXSe] de recevoir ses conseils en matière de religion et de recherches savantes.
column4: Der/die [From.GetAscetic] [From.GetBestName] ist endlich an meinem Hof eingetroffen. [From.GetFirstName] ist ein sehr nobler weiser Mensch, und ich werde mir gerne seinen/ihren Rat zu Belangen der Religion und der Gelehrsamkeit einholen.
column6: El/La [From.GetAscetic] [From.GetBestName] por fin ha llegado a mi corte. [From.GetFirstName] es una persona noble y de gran sabiduría. Con gusto recibiré sus consejos en materia de religión y asuntos académicos.

column2: It is a dark night with no moon as you light the fire for the ritual that will - Loki willing - lay the curse on [robmodnorse_accursed.GetFirstName]. As your assistant begins wailing the incantations, you slice off the hen's head and let its blood land on the item you stole. Then you cut your hand with a ceremonial dagger, a few drops of your own blood join the hen's. "Loki, son of Fárbauti, father of Hel, most malicious of all the Gods! I call on you to curse [robmodnorse_accursed.GetBestName]. Make [robmodnorse_accursed.GetHerHim] despised by all!"
column3: L[From.GetAscetic] [From.GetBestName] est enfin arrivé à ma cour. [From.GetFirstName] est un[From.GetNoneE] [From.GetManWoman] très noble et sage, et je serai heureu[Root.GetXSe] de recevoir ses conseils en matière de religion et de recherches savantes.
column4: Der/die [From.GetAscetic] [From.GetBestName] ist endlich an meinem Hof eingetroffen. [From.GetFirstName] ist ein sehr nobler weiser Mensch, und ich werde mir gerne seinen/ihren Rat zu Belangen der Religion und der Gelehrsamkeit einholen.
column6: El/La [From.GetAscetic] [From.GetBestName] por fin ha llegado a mi corte. [From.GetFirstName] es una persona noble y de gran sabiduría. Con gusto recibiré sus consejos en materia de religión y asuntos académicos.

column2: It is a dark night with no moon as you light the fire for the ritual that will - Eir willing - lay the curse on [robmodnorse_accursed.GetFirstName]. As your assistant begins wailing the incantations, you slice off the hen's head and let its blood land on the item you stole. Then you cut your hand with a ceremonial dagger, a few drops of your own blood join the hen's. "Lady Eir, Valkyrie of healing, most merciful of all the Gods! [robmodnorse_accursed.GetBestName] is unworthy of your protection, I call on you to let [robmodnorse_accursed.GetHerHim] suffer as [robmodnorse_accursed.GetSheHe] deserves!"
column3: L[From.GetAscetic] [From.GetBestName] est enfin arrivé à ma cour. [From.GetFirstName] est un[From.GetNoneE] [From.GetManWoman] très noble et sage, et je serai heureu[Root.GetXSe] de recevoir ses conseils en matière de religion et de recherches savantes.

column2: Now we shall see whether my pleas are granted.
column3: [Root.GetMOGreeting], [From.GetBestName] !
column4: [Root.GetMOGreeting], [From.GetBestName]!
column6: ¡[Root.GetMOGreeting], [From.GetBestName]!

column2: a successful curse
an unsuccessful curse

As the flames grow higher and the blood dries, you feel no response from your chosen God - you are not favoured after all. There is no doubt that [robmodnorse_accursed.GetFirstName] will feel this a little, but the results are disappointing. What's more, as you draw things to a close a dark spirit takes shape and attempts to enter your body!
column3: L[From.GetAscetic] [From.GetBestName] est enfin arrivé à ma cour. [From.GetFirstName] est un[From.GetNoneE] [From.GetManWoman] très noble et sage, et je serai heureu[Root.GetXSe] de recevoir ses conseils en matière de religion et de recherches savantes.

column2: Begone, foul spectre!
column3: [Root.GetMOGreeting], [From.GetBestName] !
column4: [Root.GetMOGreeting], [From.GetBestName]!
column6: ¡[Root.GetMOGreeting], [From.GetBestName]!

column2: Your attempt to curse [robmodnorse_accursed.GetTitledName] has failed, and now the spirits may turn on you...

You slept terribly last night, and what little rest you got was disturbed by dark dreams of a fire, a screaming hen, and a hooded figure. Later that day as you are riding through the lands, a well-known local mystic shrieks "My [Root.GetLordLady], I sense a terrible curse upon you!"
column3: L[From.GetAscetic] [From.GetBestName] est enfin arrivé à ma cour. [From.GetFirstName] est un[From.GetNoneE] [From.GetManWoman] très noble et sage, et je serai heureu[Root.GetXSe] de recevoir ses conseils en matière de religion et de recherches savantes.
column4: Der/die [From.GetAscetic] [From.GetBestName] ist endlich an meinem Hof eingetroffen. [From.GetFirstName] ist ein sehr nobler weiser Mensch, und ich werde mir gerne seinen/ihren Rat zu Belangen der Religion und der Gelehrsamkeit einholen.
